003
004package mkt;
005
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.Arrays;
008import java.util.function.BiFunction;
009import kut.Tp;
010import kut.Js;
011import kut.Arr;
012
013/** Investor model */
014public class Model {
015  /** Type of daily parameter */
016  public static final int DAY_PARAM = 0;
017  /** Type of percentage parameter */
018  public static final int PERC_PARAM = 1;
019
020
021  /** Model identifier (short name in uppercase). */
022  public final String id;
023  /** Model name. */
024  public final String name;
025  /** Parameter names. */
026  public final String[] paramNames;
027  /**
028   * Parameter types. Each parameter can be:<br>
029   *                   InvModel.DAY_PARAM or InvModel.PERC_PARAM.
030   */
031  public final int[] paramTypes;
032  /**
033   * Function to calculare references.
034   *  It has the following parameters:<ul>
035   *      <li>closes    : Matrix 'dates x companies' with market closes.<br>
036   *                      This closes must be regularized (without -1.0 values).
037   *      <li>params    : Parameter values.
038   *      <li>references: Matrix 'dates x companies' with market references.<br>
039   *      </ul>
040   */
041  public final BiFunction<double[][], double[], double[][]> calc;
042
043  /**
044   * Constructor.
045   * @param id Model identifier (short name in uppercase).
046   * @param name Model name.
047   * @param paramNames Parameter names.
048   * @param paramTypes Parameter types. Each parameter can be:<br>
049   *                   InvModel.DAY_PARAM or InvModel.PERC_PARAM.
050   * @param calc Function to calculare results.
051   *  It has the following parameters:<ul>
052   *      <li>closes    : Matrix 'dates x companies' with market closes.<br>
053   *                      This closes must be regularized (without -1.0 values).
054   *      <li>params    : Parameter values.
055   *      <li>references: Matrix 'dates x companies' with market references.<br>
056   *      </ul>
057   */
058  public Model (
059    String id, String name,
060    String[] paramNames, int[] paramTypes,
061    BiFunction<double[][], double[], double [][]> calc
062  ) {
063    this.id = id;
064    this.name = name;
065    this.paramNames = paramNames;
066    this.paramTypes = paramTypes;
067    this.calc = calc;
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * To Js.
072   * @param i InvModel.
073   * @return Js.
074   */
075  public static String toJs (Model i) {
076    ArrayList<Integer> pts = new ArrayList<>();
077    for (int t : i.paramTypes) pts.add(t);
078
079    return Js.w(Arr.mk(
080      Js.w(i.id),
081      Js.w(i.name),
082      Arr.toJs(Arr.mk(i.paramNames), (s) -> Js.w(s)),
083      Arr.toJs(pts, (t) -> Js.w(t))
084    ));
085  }
086}
